CHAT.comment: Book Reading 1; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

Chi seems a good reader and is very unaffected; she inflects the words dramatically and is cavalier about words (like Christa) that are harder to read; Mot asks a few questions during the book reading , such as the eternal <where's the egg> , but otherwise the show is Chi's
Chi and Mot sit next to each other on a couch , with Mot's arm around Chi

u.a: bef points , tapping on the book
I think the pause after tiny is for dramatic effect
follows through with finger as she reads
growls the one/on in <on Wednesday> for effect and maybe to keep it ambiguous whether she's saying one or on
rising intonation on after and much
either she's talking about the back cover , which has a picture of a leaf , an egg , and a tiny caterpillar; or the inside cover , which has white circles (as if cut out) in colored patches
flipping through pages looking for egg
